identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% 'Control Room' aesthetic for employee monitoring that feels like a high-end flight deck, not a surveillance tool.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Linear' minimalism with 'Sci-Fi' HUD density.
Emotion First: Trust and Clarity. The UI should feel precise and unopinionated.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Charts and timelines take precedence.
Zoom In: High density, low noise. Use negative space to separate logical groups, not just for decoration.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode. 1px borders are your best friend.

usage.data_display: JetBrains Mono (Weights: 400, 500). Use for timestamps, IDs, and tabular data.

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #27272A (Zinc 800). Use 'Grid Borders' strategy for dashboards.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for floating elements (modals, dropdowns).
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-md (6px) or rounded-sm (4px). Avoid large rounded corners to maintain a 'technical' feel.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/40 border border-white/10 for sticky headers and overlays.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on the main background to prevent banding.

grids.dashboard_layout: Mode B: The 'Control Room' Grid. Dense, data-heavy. Gap-4.
grids.marketing_layout: Mode A: The 'Tetris' Grid. Asymmetrical, wide gaps (Gap-12).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 ratio for normal text. Use lighter grays (Zinc 300/400) for secondary text, never dark gray on black.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Control Room' aesthetic: Dark mode by default, high density, 1px borders.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for any data/numbers/timestamps.
For the Dashboard, use the 'Bento Grid Mode B' layout strategy.
Use the provided image URLs for avatars and backgrounds. Do not use placeholders.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use it only for body text.
Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Zinc' dark theme defined in colors.
For charts, use Recharts with the defined chart colors (Emerald, Amber, Red, Blue).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
